headline: Is Cava Group a Better Growth Stock Than Chipotle Mexican Grill?
summary: Mediterranean fast-casual restaurant chain Cava Group (NYSE: CAVA) is often seen as the next Chipotle Mexican Grill (NYSE: CMG) due to its impressive growth opportunities and the potential upside it possesses.  This year, Cava's stock has been generating stronger returns for investors, with its share price up over 227% entering trading on Tuesday, versus just 32% gains for Chipotle's stock.  With Cava posting far more impressive results than Chipotle of late, has it already become the better growth stock to own?

headline: Should You Forget Domino's Pizza? Why You Might Want to Buy This Unstoppable Growth Stock Instead
summary: Domino's Pizza (NYSE: DPZ) stock gained a lot of attention recently after it was added to Berkshire Hathaway's portfolio of stock holdings.  While investors love to follow Warren Buffett's moves, it likely wasn't his stock pick given the relatively small size of the purchase.  Instead, it was likely bought by one of Berkshire's two other investment managers, Ted Weschler or Todd Combs.

headline: Chipotle raises menu prices by 2%
